modName: Stormkiss and Widowmaker - Morrwind Uniques series
summary:
DRAGONBORN DLC REQUIRED

Adds 2 new battle axes, Stormkiss and Widowmaker, to the game
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, and welcome to my new series of weapons and armor, Morrowind Uniques. This basically adds any unique armors and weapons to your Skyrim game. Now, this series should not be confused with a Morrowind Artifacts series that I may do, which will consists of daedric artifacts from Morrowind. Anyway, this mod adds two new Nordic battleaxes, Stormkiss and Widowmaker. 

Details
- Can only be added through console, will eventually change that
- Can be tempered
- DRAGONBORN DLC REQUIRED!!!!!!!!

Also be on the lookout for my new series that will be coming soon, the Oblivion Uniques series.

themusician6
author: themusician6
